tool_description: Get the prediction for bet roulette color
name: Bet Roulette Color Adviser
title: Bet Roulette Color Adviser

api_list.name: Get  Roulette Color Prediction
api_list.description: This endpoint will return the next winning roulette color. The reliability of the result is 64%
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://bet-roulette-color-adviser.p.rapidapi.com/colors"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bet-roulette-color-adviser.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
